ComicInfo.Colorist: Noir Art House, Chuck Obach, Gwenaelle Daligault
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: MitsuBlinger, CB Zane, Crima, Isma Azmil Bikri, Keith Garvey, Lena Dai, Tom Capung, Xong Bros., Drax Gal
ComicInfo.Summary:
The first part of the final conclusion to the series:
Akari is down in the dumps with depression as Itsuki seems to have gone missing since having the romantic encounter with her. Even Itsuki’s two best friends aren’t aware of his whereabouts. Unbeknown to everyone, inside “The Illusion”, Itsuki has been keeping himself busy on his own personal adventures with his new acquaintance, Eshima Kinoshita. Emotions and tempers run high between Akari and her best friends, Kiko and Shizuka, as Akari’s goal of breaking Itsuki from temptations of the virtual world she introduced him to, has become an obsession.
